column5: Hello,  Heading to Bass Haven for the first time Sept 5 for a few days in search of Musky, Walleye and Bass. I have never fished Lake St. Clair before so if anyone is willing to send me some info. it would be greatly appreciated.   Thanks in advance
for musky be prepared to run out of the bay. . lotsa bass in the bay. for wallys go outa the bay and east/northeast to 16ft and fish harnesses on small boards with worms.
